visual_desc: INT. LIGHTHOUSE KEEPER'S QUARTERS - DAY. <Sarah> (female, late 40s, short brown hair, wearing loose-fitting clothes) sits at a wooden table, meticulously cleaning a nautical chart. The room is sparsely furnished. <Gus> (medium-sized, scruffy mixed-breed dog) lies at her feet. Sunlight streams in through the window on the right, casting long shadows across the room. The table is in the center of the frame. The scene is lit by natural sunlight, creating a sense of isolation and routine.
